Reviews.Title: “Great staff, clean, big enough and great location.”
Reviews.Author: mrabbs
Reviews.Content: terrible experience roman ghetto bb horrible flight ryanair haven arrive location cant beat staff super courteous helpfull arent huge theyre clean cute shower nice hot breakfast roof spend morning considering food prices rome huge saver muffins pastries eggs sausage bacon cheese ham etc etc lovely definitly

Reviews.Title: “Ants in the room and pigeons eating our breakfast - no 4 star hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel elevator written description hotel 303 found ants wall floor bed reception change ants hotel reception chocked ants impossible eating spray kill ants airfreshener reception solved day change upstairs disgusted ants crawling bed didn´t sleep night morning eat breakfast roof terrace buffet staff pigeon standing table pies eating soon decided eat breakfast hotel disgusted reception told pigeon upstairs available compensation inconvinience paid advance there´s angry dissapointed left hotel town italy weeks rome final destination journey home book nice clean fresh hotel star hotel perfect huh perfect

Reviews.Title: “Horrible experience! Do not stay here!”

Reviews.Content: arrived elevator 4th floor horrible breakfast air conditioner ice form air movement midnight sweat night paid 4 nights left hotel day 2 hated terrible experience yourself favor stay elsewhere forget location amenities truthful advertisement

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 star hotel!”
Reviews.Author: BAF68
Reviews.Content: location service modern look clean definitely 4 star hotel overpriced quality offered shower curtains 5 floors elevators poor quality breakfast set building roof ice hams cheeses milk etc ac beds looked lite cuts worth 260 paid

Reviews.Content: hotel base exploring rome location booking indicated piazza di spagna spanish steps located hotel actually closer piazza del popolo regardless hotel 2 minute walk piazza del popolo 5 minute walk spanish steps sights trevi fountain pantheon 15 minute walk colosseum roman forum 30 minute walk st peters vatican otherwise finding line taxis piazza del popolo hotel blends street entrance doorway via babuino lobby consists front desk chairs computer hotel 4 floors breakfast 4th floor bad weather roof deck flight stairs weather ate roof deck nice elevator floor private hallway nice noise stairway guests maid closet outside hear absolutely view 3 windows looked air shaft windows provided light day promised view sort dissapointing dont offer am facing street offer view plus quiet via babuino busy street heard outside noise actually european standards bed twins pushed typical europe fairly comfortable sheets worn clean decent sized closet desk bathroom tub looks otherwise bathroom fine clean free wireless fast reliable staff friendly met housekeeper hard polite pleasant front desk staff nice leave hotel key trust heavy hand return ensures little security biggest downside breakfast worst trip buffet consisting runny scrambled eggs sad bacon assorted pastries yogurts found eat heading trip skipped breakfast found cafes close stay neighborhood location hotel overall average
